name: My Friend, the Reverse Medusa Cat
name_original: My Friend, the Reverse Medusa Cat
description:
An FPS where you must defeat enemies without letting your friend, the Reverse Medusa Cat, turn you to stone!

This game was created for the 2020 Extra Credits Game Jam with the theme "Take Care". I used this as an opportunity to learn how to use Unreal Engine, and as a result the game didn't get to where I wanted it to be from a design perspective. I think it still has at least a couple interesting ideas so it may still be worth your time to play!
